build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && npm install && npm run build && php artisan key:generate && php artisan config:clear && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan route:clear

deploy.startCommand: php artisan config:clear && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan route:clear && exec php -S 0.0.0.0:$PORT public/index.php
